Game Description

A game about a root who wants to grow and give energy to your tree. Watch out for the evil moles that will try to stop you if you enter his territory!

The game have a 3 level difficulty: Easy, Normal and Hard.

The player will chose where to grow the tree. Then the gameplay will start and the player (root)  will try to evade the moles and obtain all the water drops.

Gameplay
